title: American Matthew Riccitello Is a Force to Be Reckoned with at Just 22 Years Old
content:
Huge talent shows in the Tour de Suisse: 'Once you realize you can be up there in the mix, it really helps going forward.'

Read the full article at American Matthew Riccitello Is a Force to Be Reckoned with at Just 22 Years Old on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
